title: Type Trumps
content:
Hi People,

Just to let you know Type Trumps has now been officially released and is hitting the shops next week. You can purchase a pack here:

[http://www.face37.com/#/work/type-trumps/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130216011442/http:/www.face37.com/#/work/type-trumps/ "http://www.face37.com/#/work/type-trumps/")

All the best  
Rick
author: rtgbanks
